short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turns DayMap into a Pink theme

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows a a brand new theme for Day Map, this extension allowed for a nice pink theme for students, allowing for a better user experience on Day Map


Latest Update:

Version 2.0 - Allows new theme on DayMap
